Hope everyone enjoys the new film! It’s Halloween, everyone’s entitled to one good scare. 🎃🔪

- Michael’s lazy river float in #5 - JLC turning in a good performance in Resurrection - 87% of Season of the Witch - the almost found footage movie we got in Resurrection - Sherri Moon - Loose Loomis courtesy of @WHMPodcast Halloween 6 episode

My favourite moments in the Halloween franchise. And yes is my favourite major horror franchise - Laurie’s “Michael!” In H20 - Paul Rudd’s “I won’t let anything happen to you” which he says to a baby - Kyle Richards in the original - Flame face Michael in #2 - the shrubbery in 1
